explanation: [0-0] A long-haired woman wearing a black hat and a white bikini is standing on the beach, looking at the ice cream in her hand. On the left, a woman in a black bikini is sitting on a white blanket with black patterns, her back to the camera. On the white sand, there are many tourists sitting under red umbrellas, and a green mountain can be seen in the distance.

[0-2] As the camera moves to the left, the picture changes, and the long-haired woman wearing a black hat is chewing food in her mouth. Some of the people on the beach are talking to those around them, while others are lying still, staring straight ahead.

[2-6] Then the picture switches to the other side of the beach. There are three people sitting on beach chairs in the center of the picture. The man on the left is holding a mobile phone in his left hand and looking ahead with sunglasses on. The man sitting in the middle has his left foot on his right leg and his right hand on his face. He is wearing sunglasses and looking to the left of the picture. The woman in the black bikini sitting on the right side of the picture is looking down at her mobile phone. At the same time, a man in a red vest is standing on the beach on the right side of the picture, holding a folded umbrella in his hand. There are also tourists sitting on the beach in the distance, with green umbrellas on the beach. A group of people are standing near the coastline, and there is a lush hillside.
